title: Assiduous
author: Assiduous
content: Today most people earn billions of dollars through investments. Some of the richest people in the world also own millions of dollars in investments. Anyone investing in real estate, or an industry, because they know that a million dollar income is possible with just one investment. Real estate investing can make people rich over time. In the same way, a person can become a financial magnate over time in Bitcoin investment. Just be patient and keep investing.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Where's the source? there are only 2,781 billionaires in worldwide, I don't think you can say such amount is "most people" when the world population is around 8 billion people. Don't exaggerate "investment" even you invest $10 Million in real estate or Bitcoin, it's still not enough to become billionaires.You can earn billion of dollars by investing, but make sure you're a multibillionaire first.Quote from: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/forbes-list-of-the-worlds-billionaires-2024-more-than-ever-before-wealthier-arnault-elon-musk-jeff-bezos/Forbes has released its annual list of the world's billionaires and in 2024, there are more people on the list than ever — and they're richer than ever.There are 141 more billionaires in the world than last year, with 2,781 in total. Their combined worth equals $14.2 trillion — up by $2 trillion in 2023.

Just be patient and keep investing.Bitcoin is a highly profitable investment so it’s not surprising that those who have been accumulating good amount of bitcoin since its early years and hold them until at the present, clearly they’ll turn into millionaires if they end up selling all their coins. The bigger the amount of bitcoin you’ve been holding, the higher the amount of expected returns. However, for those who are just keeping a minimal amount, I don’t think becoming a millionaire is their goal, but most probably just to prepare a good and secured retirement in the future, something that can already sustain their necessities without getting them into debt.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: It is not impossible to become a Billionaire but you probably have about the same chances to become one as the chances to win a Lottery.  Every body pretends to know what the secrets are to becoming one but then none of them are Billionaires at the end of the day.Luck plays an important role in my opinion too, so do circumstances.  Many of the Billionaires are not 'self made' even if they advertise themselves as being so.  I truly believe you need to meet the right people at the right time and have the right ideas at the proper timing too.  If any of us knew how to become Millionaires we would waste no more time trying other ways.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: We don’t need to compare Bitcoin investments with real estate investments. Both the investments have their own advantages and disadvantages. It’s just the people’s choice where they want to invest and how flexible they are with their investments. If you ask me, then I have seen the growth of Bitcoins and their exciting returns in a shorter period of time. For this reason, I will prefer Bitcoin investments over any other types of investments. On the other hand, real estate is a more stable investment and it is legalized by the government. So yes, motivation for Bitcoins can really be generated by seeing the returns in every bull season.
